_sText:
This fightyard map is based in the setting of an abandoned hotel building on the topfloor. It features 3 breakable walls separating 4 abandoned hotel rooms ready for battle. There's 3 ways to reach the enemy team in this map; 1: Though the hallway 2: Climbing out of a window and sneaking around via the catwalk or 3: (my personal favorite) Smashing right through the destructible walls. 


Changelog v2:

-Removed exterior pipes on the catwalk:
The pipes located alongside the building were removed because they were too difficult to strafe jump around without falling. I've removed the pipes and added another small jump.

-Added decorative pipes along the catwalk:
Since the "strafe pipes" were removed, I've added a few extra "out-of-the-way" pipes for decoration.

-Adjusted wall texutre:
The interior wallpaper texture wasn't lining up properly in the hallway. I adjusted it slightly so it looks better.

-Changed lightbulbs:
The lighting looks too similar throughout the building so I replaced a few lightbulbs with slightly dimmer lights.

-Replaced physbox with func_breakable walls:This was a big issue. From T spawn the breakable walls looked a little glitchy with the lighting. I've replaced all the breakable walls with func_breakable walls so they look better.

-Rearranged hallway:
I've slightly rearranged the hallway props, as well as adding boards to the unopenable doors to make them obviously unopenable.

-Rearranged "Room 3" (Room after CT spawn):
The room directly after CT spawn has been a big issue. Players would often get stuck between a table and the beds in the middle and it would become frusterating. I've rearranged the room to prevent further issues.

-Replaced some static props with physics props:Some props should have been able to move with enough force. I've replaced the light-weighted props with physics so they will now be able to move.
